casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Joshua Lee THORPE, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156777
COA: 332694 Supreme Court of Michigan. November 2, 2018

Order

By order of Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellant to extend the time for filing his supplemental brief is GRANTED. The supplemental brief will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before December 20, 2018.
